item.description:
Hello everyone,

I'm sure you're aware of the big deadline to get apps in for the grand launch of the iPad this Saturday at 8pm our time. If not: get working... there's plenty of time!

Afterward, after it's too late on Sunday, I believe a few of us ought to get together on some comfortable couches upstairs at the Portland Public Market House at 28 Monument Square for a less formal meeting. They serve local food & drink, and have free wifi.

I've a more formal meetup in the works for a few weeks from now, which I'll be announcing relatively soon, but this one will be a chance to get acquainted and discuss a variety of Apple brand programming issues/ideas, but with natural lighting and without a projector or guard kicking us out (oops: they too close at 5pm).

If it does sound like a kind of meeting you might like to attend, but the time isn't good, let me know when works better and I might be able to change it or add another.

I hope to see some of you there.
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be on or about the couches toward the back of the second floor.
item.name: A less formal meetup
